attributes.action: Stop the Government closing Golf Courses during the lock down.
attributes.additional_details: Golf is played in the open, is good exercise and is helpful towards mental health issues caused during this time. It can be played with social distancing and ALL golf clubs have been practicing excellent safe and controlled environments throughout the year.
attributes.background: Allow Golf Courses to open for playing golf during the Lockdown period in a safe and controlled environment.

rejection.details:
You might like to sign the following petition:

Allow golf to be played with appropriate safety measures
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/557167
